review: Existing within the Google ecosystem, this is an especially excellent product for getting content onto your TV.Leveraging the Plex Media Server, companion application and the Chromecast has made consuming my media collection a simple, fast and seamless experience.Pros: - Ability to cast whatever is being consumed on your laptop [assuming you are using chrome] to your TV - Ability to cast whatever is being displayed on your phone/tablet [assuming you are using Android] to your TV - Clean interface and pleasing idle desktop displayCons: - Not really a con but a design feature to be aware of: without a phone, laptop or tablet the device cannot be controlled - USB power supply cord plugs into the end of the dongle making the device, functionally, longer than it needs to be - Lack of Ethernet port means that you might experience some chop while playing larger items from your media collection
author: Zenzo Wysocki
